name: Subjekt
description:
Game by: Matheus Gonçalves Classen

Subjekt is a time trial based movement shooter where the player must parkour to the end of a linear level under time pressure while destroying any enemies/targets in his path.

External Assets used:

  •  Advanced FPS movement by Colanderp

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • SPACE - jump
  • CTRL - Crouch
  • SHIFT - Sprint
  • SHIFT + CTRL - Slide

Note: Menu scene is suffering from a bug in its lighting which makes it pitch black.
